official_title: To designate the United States courthouse building located at 402 North Walnut Street and Prospect Avenue in Harrison, Arkansas, as the "Judge J. Smith Henley Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse building at 402 North Walnut Street and Prospect Avenue in Harrison, Arkansas, as the Judge J. Smith Henley Federal Building.
